events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, showing interest in developing cutting-edge solutions.
We reviewed the application and categorized it under Engineering based on the candidate’s experience and skills related to software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate’s file to facilitate smooth communication and next steps for the software engineer role.
Conducted a thorough initial screening call covering the candidate’s technical background, motivations, and familiarity with software engineering tools.
The candidate responded promptly with detailed answers and is enthusiastic about continuing to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate with the engineering panel to assess coding skills and problem-solving ability.
